      • Teacher

        public Teacher(java.lang.String n,
               int a,
               int p,
               int gl,
               boolean c,
               double w)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        n - is the name
        a - is the age
        p - is the phone number
        gl - is the grade level this Teacher teachers
        c - is a boolean if the Teacher has a teacher's certification
        w - is the hourly wage
